name: pnpm_workspace_poc
description: A minimal starter repository for setting up a monorepo using pnpm workspace.

scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently --pad-prefix --names "Packages,Frontend" -c "bgGreen,bgBlue" "pnpm run dev:packages" "pnpm run --filter frontend dev"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently --pad-prefix --names "Packages,Backend" -c "bgGreen,bgBlue" "pnpm run dev:packages" "pnpm run --filter backend dev"
scripts.postinstall: pnpm run --filter @acme/prisma-db db:generate && pnpm run build:packages

author: Ayaan Shaikh
